Sentencas: Natural gas is one of the most important fuels for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: The relationships among the reactions of methane over the nickel-based anode, fuel compositions, carbon deposition, electromotive force (EMF) and open circuit voltage (OCV) of SOFC are investigated in this work.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: With the increase of temperature, EMF and OCV of SOFC decrease gradually when the cell uses humidified hydrogen as fuel.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: Reactivity of methane increases gradually with the increase of temperature, which can affect the EMF and OCV of SOFC.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: When the humidified mixture of nitrogen and methane is used as the fuel, the EMF and OCV of SOFC increase gradually with the increase of temperature.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: EMF and OCV of SOFC with humidified mixture of hydrogen and methane (M-CH4: M-H2: M-H2O = 12.2: 85.3: 2.5) as fuel decrease gradually with the increase of temperature when the temperature is lower than 873 K, which is similar to that with humidified hydrogen as fuel.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: While when the temperature is higher than 923 K, the EMF and OCV of SOFC with humidified mixture of hydrogen and methane as fuel increase gradually with the increase of temperature, which is similar to that with humidified mixture of nitrogen and methane as fuel.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: OCV of SOFC is mainly affected by thermodynamic equilibriums for methane-fuelled SOFC when the anode activity is high enough, which is close to the EMF calculated according to the thermodynamic equilibriums.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC

Sentencas: While with the increase of carbon deposition, the anode activity decreases apparently and the OCV of SOFC also decreases apparently, which shows that the OCV is affected by the anode activity for methane-fuelled SOFC when the anode activity is low.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and experimental study of electrode reactions and open circuit voltages for methane-fuelled SOFC
